Total school budget share

£282,254.72

£1,538.64 from total school budget share is funding de-delegated to local authority for central services when this was a maintained school.

£17,552.65 from your total school budget share is an indicative amount that you may set aside for pupils with SEN.

Total minimum funding guarantee

-£97,398.83

Protection funding to make sure change in per pupil school budget share between 2020 to 2021 and 2021 to 2022 will not fall below your local authority guaranteed change of 0.19%.
